data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lee, Bee Yan, Forges, Bertrand Richer De, Ng, Peter K. L. (2019): Deep-sea spider crabs of the family Epialtidae MacLeay, 1838, from Papua New Guinea, with a redefinition of Tunepugettia Ng, Komai & Sato, 2017, and descriptions of two new genera (Crustacea: Decapoda: Brachyura: Majoidea). Zootaxa 4619 (1): 1-44, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4619.1.1|112 occurrences
